authority: Port Authority of New York and New Jersey
parkingRates: Official on-airport rates: $18/day (long-term economy), $39/day (terminal garage). Off-site lots typically $10-$20/day.
shuttleInfo: Most off-site lots run free shuttles every 5-15 minutes, 24/7. Terminal B has a new pedestrian bridge to parking garage.
distanceFromCity: 8 miles east of Midtown Manhattan, roughly 20-45 min by car depending on traffic
